thread.title: BRIEF-Ocean Power Technologies Signs Agreement With Eni To Provide PB3 PowerBuoy For Subsea Oil And Gas Operations

title: BRIEF-Ocean Power Technologies Signs Agreement With Eni To Provide PB3 PowerBuoy For Subsea Oil And Gas Operations

organizations.name: subsea oil and gas operations reuters
min read   ocean power technologies inc

text: March 19, 2018 / 2:48 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Ocean Power Technologies Signs Agreement With Eni To Provide PB3 PowerBuoy For Subsea Oil And Gas Operations Reuters Staff 1 Min Read   Ocean Power Technologies Inc: * OCEAN POWER TECHNOLOGIES SIGNS AGREEMENT WITH ENI S.P.A. TO PROVIDE PB3 POWERBUOY™ FOR SUBSEA OIL AND GAS OPERATIONS * OCEAN POWER TECHNOLOGIES INC - DEAL PROVIDES FOR MINIMUM 24-MONTH CONTRACT THAT INCLUDES 18-MONTH PB3 POWERBUOY LEASE & ASSOCIATED PROJECT MANAGEMENT​ * OCEAN POWER TECHNOLOGIES INC - ‍PROJECT IS EXPECTED TO COMMENCE IN MARCH 2018​
